cab.content: [jDFrom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State fur India, olh April 1920.(Received 5th.)4325. No. 178.Part I. (1) Total rifles and fine handed in by Mahsuds up to 27th March was 160 Government, 216 tribal rifles and Rs. 6,363. Some outlaws from Logar A7alley have arrived in Mahsud country, and definitely contradict Haji Abdul Razak's stories of Afghan help for Mahsuds.(2) Lala Pir arrived Wana Wazir country 31st March with money and rations. Abdul Razak has raised about 100 Wana Waziris with few Kabul Khels from Birmal to resist any columns operating up Baddar Toi.Part II.-(3) Waziristan. Nothing to report. Weather very unsettled.(4) Sheranni Column returned Kulachi and is being disbanded. No opposition was encountered during tour.All given to Press.
